channel.title: Please Help! Thanks!
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if anyone can teach me on how to add the Dark Bow's special attack. And how to improve the special attacks on the other weapons. And also add the correct GFX and muti attack and how to make it freeze on Ice barriage. Thanks (Sorry if these are nooby questions, still learning a lot about JAVA files). :D

item.title: Please Help! Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @phillip7112 phillip7112
item.description:
@phillip7112 wrote:

to fix special attacks open up specials.java… the cases plus the number next 2 it represents a single item… thats where u change specs… 2 add correct GFX u need the graphics first then u add then 2 ur code… use the search bar for graphics…

multi freeze is complicated… i got no idea…

ohh and dark bow’s special attack has 2 do with annimations… use the search bar for that also…

Read full topic
